mapper.update: update t_userrole set status=#{flag} where roleid=#{id}
mapper.select: select distinct M.* from t_user as U inner join t_userrole as R on R.permissionid=U.permissionid and R.status=true INNER JOIN t_menu as M on M.menuid=R.menuid and M."status"=TRUE where U.id=#{UserId}

select R.roleid,R.rolename,R.createtime,M.menuname,G.permissionname from t_user as u INNER JOIN t_userrole as R on R.permissionid=u.permissionid INNER JOIN t_menu as M on M.menuid=R.menuid INNER JOIN t_userpermissiongroup AS G on G.permissionid=u.permissionid where u.id=#{id}
